        Gender Profiles

        Commissioned by the Ministry of Gender Equality and Family in 2015, KWDI compiled gender profiles of 24
        countries with the result of a comprehensive gender analysis of the situation of women and men. The 24
        countries are listed below.

        Region Country
        Asia Vietnam, Indonesia, Cambodia, Philippines, Bangladesh, Mongolia, Laos, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Myanmar
        Africa Ghana, Ethiopia, Mozambique, Rwanda, Uganda, Tanzania, Senegal
        Central Asia Uzbekistan, Azerbaijan
        Latin America Colombia, Peru, Bolivia, Paraguay
        Knowledge Sharing on Korea’s
        Development in Women’s Policies

        KWDI initiated the publication series titled, “Knowledge Sharing on Korea’s Development in Women’s Policies.” It
        is the first of its kind to compile women’s development experiences in various sectors of South Korea. We have
        thus far published 28 case studies.

        KWDI’s Knowledge Sharing on Korea’s Development in Women’s Policies
